mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nm_notice WHERE writer=#{writer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nm_notice (title, content, writer, date, time) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{date}, #{time})
mapper.update: UPDATE nm_notice SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, date=#{date}, time=#{time} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM nm_notice WHERE title=#{title} AND date=#{date} AND time=#{time} AND content=#{content} AND writer=#{writer}
